H0.text: what type of joint connects the incus with the malleus. Fibrous

H1.text: what type of joint connects the incus with the malleus. Cartilaginous

H2.text: what type of joint connects the incus with the malleus. Ball-and-socket

H3.text: what type of joint connects the incus with the malleus. synovial

A4.text: The incudomalleolar joint (also called incudomallear joint, or malleoincudal joint) or articulatio incudomallearis is a small saddle-type synovial joint between the malleus (hammer) and the incus (anvil)
